name: CarShop
des: CarShop is a car sell web application. Here we sell world most expensive car and expensive brands. Buyers can order car, Delete order, And admin can Approve order and Manage all order , Add Products etc

name: Adventure-RRT
des: This web application is based on Adventure. Here Tourist can add place and book order. And can manage his order and delete his pending order.

name: Mental-Health-Care
des: This is a hospital based web application. Here are a lot of therapies like Anxiously, Mental health, Child antiquity etc. The client can search proper therapy for himself

name: Volunteer
des: This site is focused on having volunteer. Here, Anybody can make volunteer himself.

name: Red Onion
des: This is based on food . THis is a restaurant based application.You can place order here.
